--- title: Parameters keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Define all General Parameters for training!" ---

Define the dataset parameters¶

get_dataset_args[source]

get_dataset_args(parser, args=[])

Get all relevant parameters to handle the dataset -> here: MRNET

Define the general parameters:¶

get_model_args[source]

get_model_args(parser, args=[])

parameters determing the network architecture -> model_type: Which model should be applied? -> load_model: Use pretrained model? -> model_path: pretrained from which path?

get_architecture_args[source]

get_architecture_args(parser, args=[])

Parameters determing the network architecture

get_opt_args[source]

get_opt_args(parser, args=[])

parameters determing the VQVAE parameters

get_vis_args[source]

get_vis_args(parser, args=[])

parameters for visualization

# Testing for general arguments
args = []
parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description='Parameters for training')

parser = get_dataset_args(parser)
parser = get_model_args(parser)
parser = get_architecture_args(parser)
parser = get_opt_args(parser)
parser = get_vis_args(parser)

args = parser.parse_args(args=args)

test_eq(args.crop_size, 16)

Model specific parameters¶

get_IntroVAE_args[source]

get_IntroVAE_args(parser, args=[])

parameters determing the IntroVae parameters

get_DCGAN_args[source]

get_DCGAN_args(parser, args=[])

parameters determing the DCGAN parameters

get_BiGAN_args[source]

get_BiGAN_args(parser, args=[])

parameters determing the BiGAN parameters

get_VQVAE_args[source]

get_VQVAE_args(parser, args=[])

parameters determing the VQVAE parameters

get_MRNet_args[source]

get_MRNet_args(parser, args=[])

parameters determing the VQVAE parameters

# Testing for specific arguments
args = []
parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description='Parameters for training')

parser = get_IntroVAE_args(parser)
parser = get_DCGAN_args(parser)
parser = get_BiGAN_args(parser)
parser = get_VQVAE_args(parser)
parser = get_MRNet_args(parser)

args = parser.parse_args(args=args)

test_eq(args.vq_gamma, 0.99)

Export all arguments¶

get_all_args[source]

get_all_args(args=[])

return all predefined arguments

args = get_all_args()
test_eq(args.vq_class, 1.0)
